definitions.definition: the quality of being good and deserving praise:
examples: an entertaining film with little artistic merit

definitions.definition: the advantages something has compared to something else:
examples: We discussed the merits of herbal tea.

definitions.definition: according to the qualities you have or have shown, without considering any other information or comparing you to someone else:
examples: The committee will consider/judge each applicant on his or her own merits.

definitions.definition: If something merits a particular treatment, it deserves or is considered important enough to be treated in that way:
